Title: Windows Azure Integration Pack for System Center Orchestrator
Description: This project is intended to provide full automation capabilities with Windows Azure by using the Windows Azure REST API.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
This project is intended to provide full automation capabilities with Windows Azure by using the Windows Azure REST API.

Feature Requests
This project is starting off small with new features getting added along the way. If you would like to influence the development path of the project, submit your feature requests into discussions.

Version History
  • 1.0 - 10th Feb 2014 - Support for SQL Database Server
